qas.question: What fraction of New Yorkers in the private sector are employed by foreign companies?
What publication ranked New York first in the 2013 American Cities of the Future rankings?

context: Many Fortune 500 corporations are headquartered in New York City, as are a large number of foreign corporations. <a0_0>One out of ten<a0_0/> private sector jobs in the city is with a foreign company. New York City has been ranked first among cities across the globe in attracting capital, business, and tourists. This ability to attract foreign investment helped New York City top the <a1_0>FDi Magazine<a1_0/> American Cities of the Future ranking for 2013.
